text:
Man: You seem like
your best self right now.

- Right.
- Man: How did we get here?

There's a lot more confidence
in my relationships.

There were times when I was
really like, "Man, this--

is this pain ever
gonna go away?"

That sucks.
I'm sorry you went
through that for real.

Justin: I'd rather get away
 than to be in this cycle.

Now, I just have hope
in my relationship with God.

That's not based on fear.
It's not based on my past.

It's based on who
I truly am.

♪ And everything is not
 the same ♪

- Man: What are we doing here?
- Just getting a little
COVID test.

Tour's canceled
and I had to adapt to that.

There's so much negativity
in the world.

Justin: It allowed us to take
 a step back and focus
 on each other.
That was a beautiful thing.

And that turned into
 working on an album.
♪ Maybe then you know ♪

It makes me sad, you know.
I cry every time.

When I was sitting
in that chair when I was
that age,

it reminded me
that I had no idea

that this life
would take me by storm.

To me, I look at this like, wow,
you made it out of this.

I want to make content
that will inspire
and make people happy.
♪ Oh, God ♪

We also care people,
and value to people.

- Yo.
- Uplift people.
Lead with love.

I could have avoided
a lot of pain.
( indistinct singing )

♪ Holy, holy, holy,
 holy, holy ♪

Just a wild, wild ride,
and I'm happy to be doing it
with you guys.
( indistinct chatter )

It's growth,
and it's hope.
♪ Oh, God ♪

All the things that we all
 crave as individuals.

You are good enough.
You don't have to put on
a front.
Who you are is enough.

♪ There's a way you hold me,
 hold me, hold me, hold me ♪
People love a happy ending.
